options.description: Complete character generation from startup to game start

steps.screen:
Shall I pick character's race, role, gender and alignment for you? [ynaq]

[7mPick a role or profession
[0m
 <role> <race> <gender> <alignment>

 a - an Archeologist
 b - a Barbarian
 c - a Caveman/Cavewoman
 h - a Healer
 k - a Knight
 m - a Monk
 p - a Priest/Priestess
 r - a Rogue
 R - a Ranger
 s - a Samurai
 t - a Tourist
 v - a Valkyrie
 w - a Wizard
 * * Random
 / - Pick race first
 " - Pick gender first
 [ - Pick alignment first
 ~ - Set role/race/&c filtering
 q - Quit
 (end)

[38C[7mPick a race or species
[0m
[38CArcheologist <race> <gender> <alignment>

[38Ch - human
[38Cd - dwarf
[38Cg - gnome
[38C* * Random

[38C? - Pick another role first
[38C" - Pick gender first
[38C[ - Pick alignment first
[38C~ - Set role/race/&c filtering
[38Cq - Quit
[38C(end)

[39C[7mPick a gender or sex[0m

[39CArcheologist human <gender> <alignment>

[39Cm - male
[39Cf - female
[39C* * Random

[39C? - Pick another role first
[39C/ - Pick another race first
[39C[ - Pick alignment first
[39C~ - Set role/race/&c filtering
[39Cq - Quit
[39C(end)

[41C[7mPick an alignment or creed
[0m
[41CArcheologist human male <alignment>

[41Cl - lawful
[41Cn - neutral
[41C* * Random

[41C? - Pick another role first
[41C/ - Pick another race first
[41C" - Pick another gender first
[41C~ - Set role/race/&c filtering

[41C(end)

[34C[7mIs this ok? [ynq][0m

[34Cdavidbau the neutral male human Archeologist

[34Cy * Yes; start game
[34Cn - No; choose role again
[34Cq - Quit
[34C(end)

[20CIt is written in the Book of Camaxtli:

[24CAfter the Creation, the cruel god Moloch rebelled
[24Cagainst the authority of Marduk the Creator.
[24CMoloch stole from Marduk the most powerful of all
[24Cthe artifacts of the gods, the Amulet of Yendor,
[24Cand he hid it in the dark cavities of Gehennom, the
[24CUnder World, where he now lurks, and bides his time.
   -----
   |...|[12CYour god Camaxtli seeks to possess the Amulet, and with it
   |.[97md@[39m.[12Cto gain deserved ascendance over the other gods.
   |...|
   |...|[12CYou, a newly trained Digger, have been heralded
   |...[13Cfrom birth as the instrument of Camaxtli.  You are destined
   -----[12Cto recover the Amulet for your deity, or die in the
[20Cattempt.  Your hour of destiny has come.  For the sake
[20Cof us all:  Go bravely with Camaxtli!
[20C--More--
